comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out and eclipse is hanged up when click "Link Groups".

Build number:
2.2.1.v20070731-0928

Steps to reproduce:
1. New two sample data set from CUSTOMERS and ORDERS.
2. New a cube, select CUSTOMERS as Primary data set, set ORDERS.CUSTOMERNUMBER 
   as Group and ORDERS.ORDERNUMBER as Group1.
3. Click "Link Groups", click "Groups and Summaries", delete Group1, 
   click "Link Groups".

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out and eclipse is hanged up.
